topics.title: Broken Blogs?
topics.body: [Transmission's blog](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1GrFTzKpxcfJMqxtswRbvcETaj3wHQq1Gt) and a few others are broken for me. I just get a background and a circle on the left, and no page content. Is that happening for anyone else? Did some important supporting JS file get lost?

20@2.body:
Benchmarking ZeroNet 0.3.1 (rev247) Python 2.7.9 (default, Dec 10 2014, 12:24:55) [MSC v.1500 32 bit (Intel)], platform: win32...

- pure-python verify x 10..........0.838s [x1.91: Fast]

Db:
- Open x 10..........0.019s [x6.84: Insane!!]
- Insert x 10 x 1000..........0.419s [x2.39: Fast]
- Buffered insert x 100 x 100..........0.745s [x1.74: Fast]

- Indexed query x 1000..........0.137s [x1.82: Fast]

Done. Total: 5.02s
What do we do with these now that we have them?
